title: Spring Fever
description: Grab your copy of this Christmas romance for a dose of entertaining fiction!It's Christmas, but Emily has spring fever. Why is she so restless?Â  It's definitely not her job - she loves her job. This is the same restless feeling she used to get in school, when the teacher droned on and on and she stared out the window at bright blue skies, longing to be out in the warm sunshine... When everyone around her is falling in love.But it definitely isn't spring time. Still, maybe Emily is falling in love...Why else would Emily have spring fever, when it's almost Christmas?
author: Harma-Mae Smit
